

:::{#thm-cond-exch}

If subpopulations defined by values of exposure $X$ are 
conditionally exchangeable with
respect to potential outcome $Y(x)$ given covariate $\vZ$, then
the expected value of $Y(x)$ does not depend on the observed value of $X$:

$$\Expf{Y(x) | X = x', \vZ=\vz} = \Expf{Y(x) | X = x, \vZ=\vz}$$

:::
